description: This schema represents a ratio of two numerical values each with its own unit of measure. This schema models the case in which the denominator has a value greater than 1, e.g., 10 mg/5 mL.

references.description: The unit of measure of the numerator. Allowed values are drawn from the Common synonyms (non-UCUM) column of [subset of] UCUM, SI and English units.
The unit of measure of the denominator. Allowed values are drawn from the Common synonyms (non-UCUM) column of [subset of] UCUM, SI and English units.
